title: With Bekus in Nepal
creator_credit: Gail Singer, Andrew Springbett, Heather MacAndrew and Asterisk Film and Videotape Productions
brief_description: Looks at the life style of the people in a village in Nepal by focussing in particular on Bekus, a thirteen year old boy. Highlights the village blacksmith, the mill, a Hindu wedding and village musicians.
creator_credit_for_label: Gail Singer, Andrew Springbett, Heather MacAndrew and Asterisk Film and Videotape Productions
